gui.compressedbox.client_config.global_w: These settings are global for all boxes.
message.compressedbox.box_not_found_in_d: Cannot find box in world data, recreating a new one... !
message.compressedbox.box_rename:
Enter in chat the name you want to give to your box within the next 30 seconds or type 'cancel' to cancel.
 The '&' char can be used with color codes to color the box's name
message.compressedbox.box_rename_expired: Time Expired, the chat is no longer recorded
message.compressedbox.box_too_many_expor: There are too many exported schematics of this box, please delete some before exporting again !
message.compressedbox.box_export_failed: Failed to export the box structure : %s
message.compressedbox.box_not_found_entr: Failed to get your entry point, teleporting to your spawnpoint
message.compressedbox.player_box_not_fou: Unable to find in which box you are!
message.compressedbox.level_not_found: Unable to find the level for compressed blocks !
message.compressedbox.cannot_push_wall: Unable to push the wall (maybe the box is already max size) !
